((Number one Liono already gone your a little late. Number two history 101 
lesson I'm Iron Raptors Commander! Yan get ready to up date the Rules.))

::Liono::
Liono looks at the Lion Assault 2 as he continues loading "The Away team is 
Me, Dark, Koj. Key is incharge of the Earth team."

::Dark::
"I hate space flight." Dark stops loading for a moment

::Key::
"Key good luck my Love."

::Koj::
"I guess I'm traveling the Glaxay and far beyond now."

::Lilly::
Lilly hugs Koj "Stay sharp here take this" as she hands him a C.D

::Koj::
Koj Climbs in the ship.

::Inu::
Inu turns into a Tattoo and gets on attachs himself to Koj.

::Rinoa::
Waves to dark "Come back ok."

::Dark::
Dark "Your still a Kid I can take care of myself"

::Liono::
Liono Climbs into his seat "Well ladies lets not say goodbye." As he takes a 
picture of Everybody just having fun and sticks on the controls.

::Dark::
Dark lets out some breath puts picture of ? up "Lets just say"

::Koj::
Koj looks at lilly squzees his guitar pick as he places a picture on the 
Controls."Lets just say with Liono flying we are so gonna die."

::Liono::
"Koj thanks for the vote of faith give us a proverb and lets be on our way."

::Koj::
Koj takes a charm with Japanese writting slaps on it his chair it reads
"Now matter how dark the abyss the rightous alway make a way out just like 
the ray of light."

::Dark::
"What in the hell does that mean!"
